name: selenium_screenshots_alerts
description: Capture screenshots, handle alerts, popups, and browser dialogs

args: from selenium import webdriver; import os; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://example.com'); screenshot_path = '/tmp/selenium_screenshot.png'; driver.save_screenshot(screenshot_path); print(f'Screenshot saved: {screenshot_path}'); print(f'File size: {os.path.getsize(screenshot_path)} bytes'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Screenshot saved: /tmp/selenium_screenshot.png
File size: 45231 bytes

Full page screenshot captured

args: from selenium import webdriver; from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By; from selenium.webdriver.support.ui import WebDriverWait; from selenium.webdriver.support import expected_conditions as EC; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/javascript_alerts'); driver.find_element(By.XPATH, '//button[text()="Click for JS Alert"]').click(); alert = WebDriverWait(driver, 3).until(EC.alert_is_present()); print(f'Alert text: {alert.text}'); alert.accept(); print('Alert accepted'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Alert text: I am a JS Alert
Alert accepted

JavaScript alert handled

args: from selenium import webdriver; from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/javascript_alerts'); driver.find_element(By.XPATH, '//button[text()="Click for JS Prompt"]').click(); prompt = driver.switch_to.alert; prompt.send_keys('Automated input'); prompt.accept(); print('Prompt filled and accepted'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Prompt filled and accepted

JavaScript prompt received input and confirmed
